name: Pixie Play
author: Levi
desc:
For each AP spent to cast this spell, you summon a tiny sprite which then proceeds to inhabit a nearby space within range and turn invisible. Each sprite must choose a different space.

As a response to a creature moving within 10 feet of a sprite, for 0 AP you may command the sprite to trip the creature. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone and immediately end their movement this turn. This can only take effect if the creature is large size or smaller. The sprite then leaves.
